title: How to Make a Firework Fuse for Smoke Bombs

steps.title: For the rubbing alcohol, simply take a shoelace, and soak about 6 inches (15.2 cm) in the alcohol, for several seconds, and then use sooner than later, as the alcohol will evaporate.
steps.content: For the rubbing alcohol, simply take a shoelace, and soak about 6 inches (15.2 cm) in the alcohol, for several seconds, and then use sooner than later, as the alcohol will evaporate. Simply use as a fuse and light. This will make a flame towards the explosive on the string, opposed to a series of sparks, as the average fuse.

steps.title: For the potassium nitrate, mix the potassium with sugar in a container, at the ratio of 1:1.
steps.content: For the potassium nitrate, mix the potassium with sugar in a container, at the ratio of 1:1.

steps.title: Then take a piece of shoelace, and soak it in water for several seconds, and then place in the container of potassium and sugar, so that the string is fully coated.
steps.content: Then take a piece of shoelace, and soak it in water for several seconds, and then place in the container of potassium and sugar, so that the string is fully coated.

steps.title: Take the string and then let it sit flat out, so it can dry for 24 hours.

steps.title: And there you have your homemade fuse for smoke bombs, along with any other bomb that needs a fuse.
